com.adamratzman.spotify.endpoints.public

Class FollowingAPI

  • SpotifyEndpoint
    • com.adamratzman.spotify.endpoints.public.FollowingAPI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientFollowingAPI

    public class FollowingAPI
extends SpotifyEndpoint

    This endpoint allow you check the playlists that a Spotify user follows.

    • Method Detail

      • areFollowingPlaylist

        public SpotifyRestAction<java.util.List> areFollowingPlaylist(java.lang.String playlistOwner,
                                                              java.lang.String playlist,
                                                              java.lang.String users)

        Check to see if one or more Spotify users are following a specified playlist.

        Parameters:
        playlistOwner - id or uri of the creator of the playlist
        playlist - playlist id or uri
        users - user ids or uris to check
        Returns:
        List of Booleans representing whether the user follows the playlist. User IDs not found will return false
        Throws:
        - if the playlist is not found OR any user in the list does not exist

      • isFollowingPlaylist

        public SpotifyRestAction<java.lang.Boolean> isFollowingPlaylist(java.lang.String playlistOwner,
                                                                java.lang.String playlist,
                                                                java.lang.String user)

        Check to see if a specific Spotify user is following the specified playlist.

        Parameters:
        playlistOwner - id or uri of the creator of the playlist
        playlist - playlist id or uri
        user - Spotify user id
        Returns:
        booleans representing whether the user follows the playlist. User IDs not found will return false
        Throws:
        - if the playlist is not found or if the user does not exist
